org.lobobrowser.w3c.events

Interface MouseEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Event, UIEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    WheelEvent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MouseEventImpl, WheelEventImpl

    public interface MouseEvent
extends UIEvent
